Class Medic

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Troops
        • Medic
  • public class Medic
extends Troops
    Medic is a slightly downgraded infantry with the ability to shoot healing bullets at injured allies.
    Version:
    April 2020
    Author:
    Howard Yang

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()  
      void attackEnemy()
      Creates a bullet that travels in the direction the troop is facing and hurts enemies that it comes in contact with

      Creates a healing bullet that travels in the direction the troop is facing
